Description: No scratches or dents and near new condition. It's a limit edition custom shop ES-175 VS. New Power-Bright strings and plays great. Only modification is I have a nice roller bridge on there. It will be wrapped up by itself with the guitar when shipped because its just sitting there and is no glued or attached to the face of course. No damage and everything looks like new. No guitar case comes with it, just the guitar and the strap. The frets show no wear because I did not play this much because I have a lot of guitars but wanted an ES-175 because it sound so good with blues and jazz. This is my only hollow body but I just play the solid body Fenders and Gibsons I have now. US continental orders, and shipping is UPS unless you want to arrange pick up here or use your own Fed-X account or whatever. I will pack it fine with bobble wrap and double box it too. Thanks for viewing.On Jan-26-19 at 08:00:48 PST, seller added the following information: Come on! this is a give away... Want more info or specifics? Epiphone ES-175 VS by Gibson. A great sounding Arch-top Hollow body in excellent condition and plays and looks great!Introduced by Gibson back in 1949, one of the most famous jazz guitars in history. Dual Humbuckers, 24-3/4 full scale and 1-3/4 width at the 1st fret. 3-way switch selects either pick-up and blends both on pos-2.
Title: Epiphone ES-175 /VS  Custom Shop

NameValueList.Name: Modification Description
Value: Installed the roller bridge. That's all. The bridge is not attached to the guitar; the string tension keeps it in place, really easy to adjust as you might know.

ConditionDescription: Really nice Epiphone ES-175 VS custom shop guitar with an upgraded roller bridge. (The stock bridge is ok but this is way better).  I've owned this one since new about 10 years ago or so; but I must have tossed the purchase receipt. New Thomastik-Infeld Power-Brights strings. I will loosen for shipping. Does not include the case but I have many guitar shipping boxes and it will be packed well and if any damage in shipping, I will take it back or reimburse the buyer accordingly. Everything works great, pots, the 3-way switch etc.
